description: A top official says police can open fire on "violent radicals" protesting against the government.
title: Belarus protests: Police authorised to use lethal weapons
title_page: Belarus protests: Police authorised to use lethal weapons - BBC News
maintext: Critics of Mr Lukashenko, who has been in power since 1994, said Sunday saw police use some of the most brutal tactics against protesters since the immediate aftermath of the election. Riot police again used water cannon and stun grenades to break up the latest rally in Minsk, and many protesters were beaten with police batons.
